includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A teenage schoolgirl (Nina Dobrev) falls for a mysterious new kid (Paul Wesley), who happens to be a vampire. Supernatural drama from the creator of Dawson's Creek and The Following.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A schoolgirl (Nina Dobrev) falls for a mysterious new kid (Paul Wesley), who happens to be a vampire. Teen drama from the creator of Dawson's Creek.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A teenage schoolgirl (Nina Dobrev) falls for a mysterious new kid (Paul Wesley), who happens to be a vampire. Supernatural drama from the creator of Dawson's Creek and The Following.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Elena, Stefan and Damon attempt to figure out Katherine's plan and take on a dangerous new foe in this second season of the supernatural drama. Nina Dobrev stars.

includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Elena's first year at college is swiftly derailed by more supernatural goings-on in Mystic Falls. A pulse-racing and heart-breaking fifth season of vampire drama starring Nina Dobrev.

includedAssets.title: Season 6

title: The Vampire Diaries Seasons 1-6
synopsis: A teenage girl (Nina Dobrev) finds herself thrust into a strange new supernatural world as she wrestles with her love for a pair of charming and handsome vampire brothers. Fantasy drama from the creator of Dawson's Creek and The Following.
shortSynopsis: A teenage girl is thrust into a strange new world as she wrestles with her love for a pair of charming vampire brothers. Supernatural drama.
mediumSynopsis: A teenage girl (Nina Dobrev) finds herself thrust into a strange new supernatural world as she wrestles with her love for a pair of charming and handsome vampire brothers. Fantasy drama from the creator of Dawson's Creek and The Following.
